ABOUT_ME_COMPONENT.HEADLINE: About me
ABOUT_ME_COMPONENT.DESCRIPTION: I am a frontend developer from Kassel, Germany, with expertise in modern web technologies such as Angular, React, JavaScript and TypeScript. My focus is on the development of user-friendly and high-performance websites and web applications.
ABOUT_ME_COMPONENT.REMOTE_WORK: Although I am based in the heart of northern Hessen, I am not tied to a fixed location. I work remotely and offer my expertise to companies throughout Germany to implement digital projects flexibly and efficiently.
ABOUT_ME_COMPONENT.PROJECT_APPROACH: From the initial idea to the completion of your project, I will guide you through all stages of development. From the first sketch to the finishing touches, we will work together to create a solution that is tailored to your needs and the needs of your users.
ABOUT_ME_COMPONENT.UX_UI: With my background in UX/UI design, I offer the complete package for successful web projects. I understand both technical development and the importance of user-centred design for engaging, intuitive experiences.

SKILLS_COMPONENT.EXPERIENCE_TECH: I have worked on various projects using different front-end technologies. I enjoy trying out new tools and techniques to learn and keep up with the latest in web development.
SKILLS_COMPONENT.CONTACT_INVITE: Write to me, I look forward to expanding my knowledge!

PORTFOLIO_COMPONENT.DESCRIPTION: Here is a selection of my projects - interact with the projects to see my skills in action.

PROJECT_COMPONENT.DESCRIPTION_JOIN: Kanban-style task manager. Create and organise tasks using drag and drop, assign users and categories.
PROJECT_COMPONENT.DESCRIPTION_ELPOLLOLOCO: A simple jump and run game based on an object oriented approach. Help Pepe find coins and poison bottles to fight the killer chicken.
PROJECT_COMPONENT.DESCRIPTION_POKEDEX: Based on the PokéAPI, a simple library that provides and catalogues Pokémon information.
